entry.title: I Didn’t Mean to Be Something I’m Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,381Chapters: 9/23Kudos: 260

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They’re boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they’re dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface. AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip where Buck and Eddie's marriage of convenience has become a secret relationship instead.

entry.title: My Beloved Ghost and Me.
entry.summary:
Author: daggerandrosie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 95,254Chapters: 15/17Kudos: 44

Summary: “Listen Buckley, I need you to know that this whole…” The officer gestured to his' clothes. “Gothics United Against Following Curfew club you're a part of can end up real bad, you can die kid. Or worse, go to jail.”Buck doesn't think he looks much like a goth, aside from wearing black, and he only does it because it's easier to sneak around like that, there's nothing about him… Scratch that. Officer Gallagher just found him lurking around the cemetery at two in the morning. Because he talks to ghosts.Always have and probably always will.It fucking sucks.It sucks. so. bad.And now he has one. A ghost. In his room. A very handsome one at that, an old cowboy with a cowboy hat, tight pants, boots and big brown eyes.Buck is so, so, very fucked

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,626Chapters: 21/23Kudos: 416

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: Oh, how the turns have tabled
entry.summary:
Author: dangerouscoffeetheorist

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,718Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: “Buck, you get checked out?” Hen asks. Something she always asks him, even if he didn't run into a burning kitchen that collapsed.Buck leans against the truck casually, giving her what he thinks is his winning smile. He's been told it's very winning - and he's also been told it's on the side of cheeky. But a wins a win in his book. The tip of his tongue is ready to tell her that he's all good. He is all good, it's probably just a bruise. Nothing to cry about- nor worry anyone over when they've almost made it to the end of shift.Before he can, a voice behind him speaks up.“No he hasn't.”Buck does not jump a foot in the air at the probie's voice.-/-/-/-/-5 times Buck gets hurt/sick/injured and Ravi tells everyone about it, and 1 times Ravi gets hurt and Buck is vengeful.

entry.title: Plasticine
entry.summary:
Author: LoneswaggingRanger

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,688Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 10

Summary: In which Buck finds himself embroiled in a less than stellar relationship in order to cope with his failures. He deserves everything that's happening to him, surely. Buck climbed down from the truck, face blank. He'd been put on the sidelines again. Single man on hose duty while Eddie got two kids out of a burning building. When they returned to the firehouse, Bobby didn't bother speaking to him other than the cursory, "You're on cleaning duty tonight." Buck nodded placidly, and went off to get a mop.

entry.title: Two Lines Means Positive, Right?
entry.summary:
Author: James_Madison_617

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,446Chapters: 1/15Kudos: 6

Summary: Buck has four big problems in his life right now. Most people might scoff or say, “You don’t even know how hard life gets,” when a teenager complains about their life, but he feels justified in this. Junior year was kicking his ass, and he wasn’t looking forward to his senior year at all, especially if it’s anything like this. Every day of his life feels like a losing battle with everything going on around him and he was just so tired.The first would be high school, the workload making him stay up night after night and exhaust himself to get good enough grades to appease his parents. The second would be the previously mentioned parents who were on his ass about everything he did, constantly comparing him to how they think his brother would have turned out. The third issue was the fact that he was a trans man, another thing his parents disapproved of. The last and most pressing problem he was facing was the positive pregnancy test on his bathroom counter.Or,When Buck got pregnant as a teen and kept his child a secret from the 118 for years and how they found out.(This is the extended version of a one-shot I wrote a few months ago)

entry.title: turning point
entry.summary:
Author: rizcriz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,362Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 266

Summary: Karen sits on the coffee table across from him, leaning in and placing a steady weight on his knees.Above them, he hears, “Did something happen to Buck? Should we call Maddie?”Eddie chokes, sitting upright, and looking over his shoulder at Hen, “No,” he says, voice gravelly. “Do not call Maddie.”“Okay,” Hen says, frowning. “Why?”He groans, turning back around and burying his face in his hands again. “Because Bucks probably already told her and there’s no doubt I’ve jumped to the top of her to be killed list.” He looks up. “Don’t tell me she doesn’t have a to be killed list, because I guarantee she does now.”“Okay. What’s going on?”He takes a deep breath, shaking his head. “I kissed Buck.”

entry.title: Feelin’ your electric touch
entry.summary:
Author: Baileyloves911

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,489Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Eddie’s standing near the turnout lockers now with his arms folded pretending he’s focused on re folding a towel.He’s not.He’s watching Buck.Again.Hen appears like a damn specter slow and deliberate with a half-eaten granola bar in one hand and the smuggest expression known to man already forming.She leans next to him casually. “You know”she starts with her voice deceptively mild.“I’ve seen that look before”Eddie startles and nearly drops the towel.“What look?”Hen just grins. “The one you’re wearing like a flashing neon sign. The one that says ‘I’m a man in love and I’m in somuch denial about it that I’m about to fold that towel into confetti’”Eddie glances down.Sure enough the towel is a wrinkled mess in his hands.“I’m not—”he starts then stops. “It’s not like that”Hen tilts her head while taking a bite of the bar. “Mmm. Sure. That’s why you’ve been staring at Buck for thirty solid minutes like he just invented fire”

entry.title: Buddie On Tour
entry.summary:
Author: SeaOfBread

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,009Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 15

Summary: “Hi, my name is Mark. I’m part of Harry’s team,” he says, keeping his face neutral and strictly professional. “He requested you three to be brought backstage immediately after the set.”“All of us?” Eddie hears himself ask before he can think about it.“All of you, yes,” Mark repeats.Buck’s eyes are wide as saucers. “Does he uh— Does he usually bring people backstage like this?”“Not since before the pandemic.”“Did he say what for?” Chris asks.“Nope.” Mark either seems to be pressed for time or simply just doesn’t care, because he doesn’t elaborate. “I’ll come get you during Kiwi, and let you through the barrier. You’ll follow me along this way to the backstage entrance. Don't tell anyone else where you're going, and cell phones will be confiscated before you are allowed inside. Got it?”They all nod at him in response, wide-eyed and in a mild state of shock. No one says anything until he walks away.“Holy shit,” Chris blurts. Or: When Eddie finds himself attending Love On Tour with Buck and Chris, one night changes the course of his life forever.
